Package leitej.thread

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgnosticThread
    The AgnosticThread class extends Thread to achieve an agnostic and asynchronous invocation of any object's public methods.
    PoolAgnosticThread
    Pool of Agnostic Thread

    This class provides a pool of threads that extend AgnosticThread.
    You can get pools by setting the maximum and minimum numbers of threads running simultaneously in this pool.

    The constructor will put a call to closeAsync() in the ShutdownHookUtil.add(InvokeItf).
    ThreadData
    This class uses InvokeItf to know what will be executed.
    XAgnosticThread
    eXtended Agnostic Thread
    XThreadData
    This class uses DateTimerItf to give the steps of execution.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ThreadPriorityEnum
    Enumerates all the possible values for ThreadPriorityEnum field.
